channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Builder – Create highly converting, mobile friendly marketing popups.
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Builder – Create highly converting, mobile friendly marketing popups.

item.title: CVE-2022-1894|2024-08-03T00:17:00.933Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20create%20highly%20converting%2C%20mobile%20friendly%20marketing%20popups.
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 4.1.11 does not escape and sanitize some settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltred_html is disallowed
